data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of Scopocira Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Erika L. S., Ruiz, Gustavo R. S. (2014): Taxonomic revision of Scopocira Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 3893 (2): 151-195, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3893.2.1
